SEARCH
Package com.example.chicksevent.fragment

Class ProfileFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.example.chicksevent.fragment.ProfileFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
public class ProfileFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
Fragment responsible for displaying and editing the current user's profile.

Allows the user to view and modify their name, email, phone number, and notification preferences. Supports navigation to events, event creation, and notifications. Also provides profile deletion.

User identity is determined using Settings.Secure.ANDROID_ID.

    • renderProfile

      private com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Boolean> renderProfile()
      Loads the current user's profile data from Firebase and populates the input fields.

      Reads the entire "User" node, finds the entry matching userId, and updates the UI with name, email, phone, and notification preference.

      Returns:
      a Task that resolves to true if the user profile exists, false otherwise

    • updateProfile

      private void updateProfile()
      Updates the current user's profile in Firebase using input from the UI.

      Creates a new User instance with the current userId and calls User.updateProfile(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, boolean) to validate and persist changes. Shows a toast message on success or failure.

    • deleteProfile

      public void deleteProfile()
      Deletes the current user's profile from Firebase.

      Calls FirebaseService.deleteEntry(java.lang.String) to remove the user node. Clears the input fields and shows a confirmation toast. Logs an error if userId is invalid.

    • s

      private static String s(CharSequence cs)
      Utility method to safely convert a CharSequence to a trimmed string.
      Parameters:
      cs - the input character sequence
      Returns:
      trimmed string, or empty string if input is null
